extends Object

        radius - Radius of circle

      • getRadius

        public double getRadius()

      • isPointInside

        public boolean isPointInside(Point p)
        Returns true if point is inside circle and false if it is outside. If the point is on the circle's line, it is considered as inside.
        Parameters:
        p - Point to check
        Returns:
        boolean value is the point inside circle

      • findPointsInside

        public MyArrayList<Point> findPointsInside(MyArrayList<Point> listOfPoints)
        Returns points which are inside or on the circle
        Parameters:
        listOfPoints - list of points where to search
        Returns:
        array of points found, in none found returns empty array

      • findPointsInside

        public MyArrayList<Point> findPointsInside(MyArrayList<Point> listOfPoints,
                                           MyHashSet<Point> setOfPointsToExlude)
        Returns points which are inside or on the circle and filters out from results if given points are found
        Parameters:
        listOfPoints - list of points where to search
        setOfPointsToExlude - list of points which to exclude from output
        Returns:
        array of points found, in none found returns empty array
